import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom" export default function DirectMsg(){ const baseURL = "http://localhost:4000/api/events/get"; const [featuredEvents, setFeaturedEvents] = React.useState([]); const [people, setPeople] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { getFeaturedEvents(); getPeople(); }, []); // Get Featured Events function getFeaturedEvents(){ axios.get(`${baseURL}`).then((response) => { setFeaturedEvents(response.data); console.log(response.data); }); } // Get people & organizers function getPeople() { axios.get(`${baseURL}`).then((response) => { setPeople(response.data); console.log(response.data); }); } return(
